channel.title: (deathlypvpz) server help!
channel.description:
Hi,i have deathlypvpz client/source and i wanted to put my server online that i can try myself with other ip..
1) i went to no-ip.com 2) i registered 3) i hosted into this Deathpk.no-ip.biz 4) then i copied my all client files to another file into client 5) i went to javafiles and client 6) i changed ip into this deathpk.no-ip.biz 7) then i opened duc v4.0.1 8) Put a ip into it 9) i tried to login with other client 10) ERROR CONNECTING TO SERVER.

item.title: (deathlypvpz) server help!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

You connect locally using 127.0.0.1, because you’re on the same computer as the server.
Everyone else connects using your no-ip you set up.

Read full topic

item.title: (deathlypvpz) server help!
item.dc:creator: @Kristen1234 Kristen1234
item.description:
@Kristen1234 wrote:

Hi,i have deathlypvpz client/source and i wanted to put my server online that i can try myself with other ip…

  1. i went to no-ip.com
  2. i registered
  3. i hosted into this Deathpk.no-ip.biz
  4. then i copied my all client files to another file into client
  5. i went to javafiles and client
  6. i changed ip into this deathpk.no-ip.biz
  7. then i opened duc v4.0.1
  8. Put a ip into it
  9. i tried to login with other client
  10. ERROR CONNECTING TO SERVER.

Read full topic
